info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 13 at 9:41PM CDT until June 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN JACKSON...SOUTHWESTERN KIOWA...SOUTHEASTERN HARMON AND SOUTHEASTERN GREER COUNTIES... At 941 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blair, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Altus, Mangum, Blair, Olustee, Martha, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Warren, Duke, Hester, and southeastern Altus-Lugert Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
